items.name: HOLMSHEIDI
items.remarks:
Reykjavik Ultralightclub.
Facilities: Clubhouse, Fuel MOGAS95 E10, Hangars

items.name: TUNGUBAKKAR MOSFELLSBAE
items.remarks:
Aerobatic flight not permitted.
Aircraft with more than 200 HP not permitted except for emergency.
The aerodrome is open for use by general air traffic except that no instructional or practice flights are allowed and aircraft with engine of 200 hp or more are not allowed to use the aerodrome except in emergency.
Due to the proximity of the Reykjavik Control Zone, pilots are advised that before flying into BIRK CTR a FPL shall be submitted with the flight data specialists tel. +354 424 4240 or e-mail to fjarrit@isavia.is (see ENR 1.10 and ENR 1.11) and a clearance to enter BIRK CTR must be obtained from BIRK TWR.

frequencies.name: LIGHTS RWY05/23
frequencies.remarks:
For RWY LGT, key on 122.8 MHz 3 times.
The lights turn off after 18 min.
The lights should only be used in emergencies or special cases.

items.name: HUSAFELL
items.remarks: Due to no taxiway or apron, the landing strip is restricted to only one aircraft at a time.
